author: Unreal Engine
description:
Surviving on the UEFN platform as a solo developer can be a daunting task. 

This talk recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 can be your survival guide to finding success when collaborating with other creators, working on a commission for a team, or creating islands for yourself. From advice on branding and marketing to managing risks and maximizing rewards, creators can learn the skills needed to not only survive but thrive in UEFN.

Tom Jank covers the pros and cons of each aspect of solo developer work in the UEFN ecosystem; what it's like to work with brands, content creators, and large studios as a freelancer; and tips on branding your own original work and identity.

Learn more about UEFN here: unrealengine.com/uses/uefn-unreal-editor-for-fortnite

#UnrealEditorForFortnite, #UEFN, #Fortnite, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Collabs, Commissions, and Creating: Tom Jank’s UEFN Survival Guide | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
We’re releasing two brand-new animation sample projects for Unreal Engine: the A-COM Animatic Sample and A-COM Animation Sample. These projects are available today for UE 5.6, with a UE 5.7 update coming soon. Created by Agora Studio, they provide an insight into how to storyboard and animate a short in Unreal Engine from scratch.

https://dev.epicgames.com/community/learning/courses/mJD/animation-workflows-in-unreal-engine-5-6-a-com-animation-sample/Z2VP/unreal-engine-exploring-the-animation-sample-production-files-a-com-animation-sample-lesson-1
title: Exploring the A-COM Sample Projects | Inside Unreal

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Steamroller Studios transformed their development team from a traditional offline pipeline to one that leverages Unreal Engine to empower their small yet passionate crew to create Spice Frontier, a handcrafted, retro-inspired odyssey through the cosmos in search of Earth's forgotten spices. Drawing inspiration from the vibrant aesthetics of 1980's animation, the project blends innovative handcrafted style with the robust world-building capabilities of Unreal Engine.

With Unreal Engine as their main production tool, the team took great care throughout the production to ensure their design choices would work well in Unreal Engine as well as push it in a very stylized direction.

In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, Josh Carroll of Steamroller Studios provides a tour of the decisions the team made throughout length of production, from the practical strategies of assembling a real-time capable crew to the artistic and technical strategies behind character design/performa
title: Spice Frontier: Designing a Production for a Real-Time Engine  | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
At Unreal Fest Seattle, we showcased our BMW Demo, highlighting an automated pipeline that integrates a full CAD dataset into Unreal Engine, complete with stunning lighting and materials. 

This Beyond Configurators webinar builds on our technical session, where we explored how this digital twin revolutionizes the way automotive brands and agencies create interactive experiences. 

Discover how you can use your own datasets to build real-time, fully interactive applications with Lumen and Nanite—without the need for additional tools or processes.

Watch the relevant Unreal Fest talks here:
Beyond Configurators: Visualizing the brand new BMW 5 series in Unreal Engine: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rtS-x4FydjQ
Visualizing Complex Products in Unreal: Keys to Success: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rn5If_6SyUI

#UnrealEngine #UE5 #Automotive #digitaltwins #visualization #configurator
title: Beyond Configurators: Redefining automotive CAD visualization with Unreal Engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this recorded session from Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 in which BMW demonstrates how they used Unreal Engine to visualize every part of the new 5 Series, down to the nuts and bolts.

Unreal Engine has been used for many years to deliver real-time photorealistic car configurators. But configurators are made from visualization models that focus on visible surfaces—what happens if we try to visualize every single part of the vehicle? In this demo, BMW does just that. 

Check out the video for a deep dive into the demo, how BMW did it, and how you can, too.

To learn more about Unreal Engine, check out our website: https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US

#BMW, #Configurator, #5Series, #AutomotiveVisualization, #Lumen, #Nanite,#UnrealEngine, #UnrealFestSeattle
title: Beyond Configurators: Visualizing the brand new BMW 5 series in Unreal Engine | Unreal Fest 2024

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this recorded session from Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 that explores the key strategies to integrating Unreal Engine into your product visualization pipeline.  

We cover the foundation of Unreal Engine-powered pipelines and showcase practical examples immediately applicable to your workflow.

To learn more about Unreal Engine, check out our website: https://www.unrealengine.com/en-US

#ProductVisualization, #UnrealEngine, #UnrealFestSeattle
title: Visualizing Complex Products in Unreal: Keys to Success | Unreal Fest 2024
